sen.j: 死罪（しざい）とは、江戸時代に庶民に科されていた6種類ある死刑のうちの一つで、斬首により命を絶ち、死骸を試し斬りにする斬首刑の刑罰のこと。
sen.e: Shizai is one of the 6 types of capital punishment imposed on commoner criminals in the Edo Period, in which the criminal is beheaded and the corpse used to test the sharpness of swords.
Shizai is one of the 6 types of capital punishment imposed on commoner criminals in the Edo Period, in which the criminal was beheaded and the corpse was used to test the sharpness of swords.
sen.cmt: isをwasに変更しました。corpseの後にwasを入れました。
sen.e: Shizai is one of the 6 types of capital punishment imposed on commoner criminals in the Edo Period, in which the criminal was beheaded and the corpse was used to test the sharpness of swords.

sen.j: 付加刑として財産が没収され、死体の埋葬や弔いも許されなかった。
sen.e: Additionally, the property of the criminal was seized, and neither burial nor funeral was allowed for the executed criminal.
Additionally, the property of the criminal was seized, and neither burial nor funeral was allowed for the executed criminal.
Additionally, the property of the criminal was seized, and neither burial nor funeral was allowed for the executed criminal.

sen.j: 罪状が重い場合は市中引き回しが付加されることもあった。
sen.e: If the offense was grave, additional punishment could be imposed by parading the criminal in the streets.
If the offense was grave, additional punishment could be imposed by dragging the criminal on the streets.
sen.cmt: parading をdraggingに変更しました。
sen.e: If the offense was grave, additional punishment could be imposed by dragging the criminal on the streets.

sen.j: 盗賊（強盗）、追い剥ぎ、詐欺などの犯罪に科された刑罰である。
sen.e: This form of capital punishment was imposed for highway robbery (forcible burglary), robbery stripping victims of all belongings, fraud, etc.
This form of capital punishment was imposed for robbery (forcible burglary), brigandage, and fraud, etc.
sen.cmt: 盗賊（強盗）、追い剥ぎの英語表現を変更しました。
sen.e: This form of capital punishment was imposed for robbery (forcible burglary), brigandage, and fraud, etc.

sen.j: 強盗ではなく窃盗の場合でも、十両盗めば死罪と公事方御定書で規定された。
sen.e: Kujigata-osadamegaki (the code of law under the Edo shogunate) provided that shizai is imposed on theft, even when not involving violence against victims, so long as the amount stolen is 10 ryo (Edo Period currency unit).

Kujigata-osadamegaki (the code of law under the Edo shogunate) provided that shizai is imposed on theft, even when not involving violence against victims, so long as the amount stolen is 10 ryo (Currency unit of the Edo Period).

sen.e: Kujigata-osadamegaki (the code of law under the Edo shogunate) provided that shizai is imposed on theft, even when not involving violence against victims, so long as the amount stolen is 10 ryo (Currency unit of the Edo Period).

sen.j: また、十両以下の窃盗でも累犯で窃盗の前科が2度ある場合、3度目には金額に関わらず自動的に死罪となった。
sen.e: Also, this type of execution was imposed automatically even for theft in amounts smaller than 10 ryo, if the thief is found to have committed larceny twice in the past.
Even when the amount stolen is below 10 ryo, if the thief has two convictions for larceny, shizai is automatically imposed regardless of the amount stolen.
sen.cmt: 金額に関わらずが訳漏れしていたので、左記のように修正しました。
sen.e: Even when the amount stolen is below 10 ryo, if the thief has two convictions for larceny, shizai is automatically imposed regardless of the amount stolen.

sen.j: 試し切りの際に、斬首後の死骸を載せる台を土壇場といった。
sen.e: The platform on which the beheaded corpse was placed for use to test swords was called "dotanba."
The platform on which the beheaded corpse was placed for testing the sharpness of swords was called dotanba.
